TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pasawali, title = Pasawali, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pasawali} }

S.FORM: == O ngangan no Pasawali == Itiniay i Taitung Cen no Taitung ko Pasawali a niyaro', 139 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 379 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 52% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 196 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 48% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 183 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 48%, Paiwan 1%, Puyuma 1%, roma 2%. O katadamaanan no niyaro'

== O ngangan no Pasawali == Itiniay i Taitong Cen no Taitong ko Pasawali a niyaro', 139 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 379 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 52% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 196 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 48% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 183 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 48%, Paiwan 1%, Poyoma 1%, roma 2%. O katadamaanan no niyaro'
